attributes.action: Create a counter-petition for each e-petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A conventional petition provides a way to express a strongly held opinion but without the opportunity to express an equally strong opinion in disagreement. Each e-petition should provide an opportunity to either support or oppose it and both views should be counted. This was never feasible with a conventional petition but would clearly be more useful as an indication of overall public sentiment on the issue of the petition.

rejection.details:
This has been dealt with in our faqs:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/faq
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
